2436     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
2437     *
2438     * @see #assignable(Type, Type)
2439     */
2440    @OverridingEncouraged
2441    protected <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2442                                                                          final boolean lowerBounded,
2443                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
2444      return false;
2445    }
2446
2447    /**
2448     * Returns {@code true} if and only if a reference bearing the
2449     * type modeled by the supplied {@code payloadTypeVariable} is
2450     * assignable to a reference bearing the type modeled by the
2451     * supplied {@code receiverWildcardType}, according to the
2452     * assignability rules modeled by this {@link Semantics} instance,
2453     * and if and only if {@code payloadTypeVariable} models a Java
2454     * {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable type variable} and
2455     * not any other type, and if and only if {@code
2456     * receiverWildcardType} models a {@linkplain
2457     * java.lang.reflect.WildcardType wildcard type} and not any other
2458     * type.
2459     *
2460     * <p>This method is called by the {@link #assignable(Type, Type)}
2461     * method.</p>
2462     *
2463     * <p>This implementation returns {@code false} in all cases.
2464     *
2465     * @param <X> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
2466     * receiverWildcardType}; often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type
2467     * java.lang.reflect.Type}
2468     *
2469     * @param <Y> the kind of type modeled by the {@code payloadTypeVariable};
2470     * often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type java.lang.reflect.Type}
2471     *
2472     * @param receiverWildcardType the receiver type as described
2473     * above; must not be {@code null}
2474     *
2475     * @param lowerBounded whether {@code receiverWildcardType} is a
2476     * lower-bounded wildcard type
2477     *
2478     * @param payloadTypeVariable the payload type as described above; must
2479     * not be {@code null}
2480     *
2481     * @return {@code false} in all cases
2482     *
2483     * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
2484     * idempotent and deterministic.
2485     *
2486     * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe
2487     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
2488     *
2489     * @see #assignable(Type, Type)
2490     */
2491    @OverridingEncouraged
2492    protected <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2493                                                                      final boolean lowerBounded,
2494                                                                      final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2495      return false;
2496    }
2497
2498    /**
2499     * Returns {@code true} if and only if a reference bearing the
2500     * type modeled by the supplied {@code payloadWildcardType} is
2501     * assignable to a reference bearing the type modeled by the
2502     * supplied {@code receiverWildcardType}, according to the
2503     * assignability rules modeled by this {@link Semantics} instance,
2504     * and if and only if {@code payloadWildcardType} models a Java
2505     * {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.WildcardType wildcard type} and
2506     * not any other type, and if and only if {@code
2507     * receiverWildcardType} models a {@linkplain
2508     * java.lang.reflect.WildcardType wildcard type} and not any other
2509     * type.
2510     *
2511     * <p>This method is called by the {@link #assignable(Type, Type)}
2512     * method.</p>
2513     *
2514     * <p>This implementation returns {@code false} in all cases.
2515     *
2516     * @param <X> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
2517     * receiverWildcardType}; often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type
2518     * java.lang.reflect.Type}
2519     *
2520     * @param <Y> the kind of type modeled by the {@code payloadWildcardType};
2521     * often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type java.lang.reflect.Type}
2522     *
2523     * @param receiverWildcardType the receiver type as described
2524     * above; must not be {@code null}
2525     *
2526     * @param receiverWildcardTypeLowerBounded whether {@code
2527     * receiverWildcardType} is a lower-bounded wildcard type
2528     *
2529     * @param payloadWildcardType the payload type as described above; must
2530     * not be {@code null}
2531     *
2532     * @param payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded whether {@code
2533     * payloadWildcardType} is a lower-bounded wildcard type
2534     *
2535     * @return {@code false} in all cases
2536     *
2537     * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
2538     * idempotent and deterministic.
2539     *
2540     * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe
2541     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
2542     *
2543     * @see #assignable(Type, Type)
2544     */
2545    @OverridingEncouraged
2546    protected <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromWildcardType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2547                                                                      final boolean receiverWildcardTypeLowerBounded,
2548                                                                      final Type<Y> payloadWildcardType,
2549                                                                      final boolean payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded) {
2550      return false;
2551    }
2552
2553  }
2554
2555  /**
2556   * An abstract partial {@link Semantics} that permits subtyping.
2557   *
2558   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
2559   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
2560   */
2561  @Experimental
2562  public static abstract class VariantSemantics extends Semantics {
2563
2564
2565    /*
2566     * Constructors.
2567     */
2568
2569
2570    /**
2571     * Creates a new {@link VariantSemantics}.
2572     */
2573    protected VariantSemantics() {
2574      super();
2575    }
2576
2577
2578    /*
2579     * Instance methods.
2580     */
2581
2582
2583    /**
2584     * Returns {@code true} if and only if a reference bearing the
2585     * type modeled by the supplied {@code payloadClass} is assignable
2586     * to a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied {@code
2587     * receiverClass}, according to the assignability rules modeled by
2588     * this {@link Semantics} instance, and if and only if {@code
2589     * payloadClass} models a {@linkplain Class Java class} and not
2590     * any other type, and if and only if {@code receiverClass} models
2591     * a {@linkplain Class Java class} and not any other type.
2592     *
2593     * <p>This method is called by the {@link #assignable(Type, Type)}
2594     * method.</p>
2595     *
2596     * <p>This implementation returns {@code true} if and only if
2597     * {@link Type#supertypeOf(Type)
2598     * receiverClass.supertype(payloadClass)} returns {@code true}.
2599     *
2600     * @param <X> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
2601     * receiverClass}; often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type
2602     * java.lang.reflect.Type}
2603     *
2604     * @param <Y> the kind of type modeled by the {@code payloadClass};
2605     * often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type java.lang.reflect.Type}
2606     *
2607     * @param receiverClass the receiver type as described above; must
2608     * not be {@code null}
2609     *
2610     * @param payloadClass the payload type as described above; must
2611     * not be {@code null}
2612     *
2613     * @return {@code true} if and only if {@link
2614     * Type#supertypeOf(Type) receiverClass.supertypeOf(payloadClass)}
2615     * returns {@code true}
2616     *
2617     * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
2618     * idempotent and deterministic.
2619     *
2620     * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe
2621     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
2622     *
2623     * @see #assignable(Type, Type)
2624     */
2625    @Override
2626    protected <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverClass, final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
2627      return receiverClass.supertypeOf(payloadClass);
2628    }
2629
2630    /**
2631     * Returns {@code true} if and only if a reference bearing the
2632     * type modeled by the supplied {@code payloadGenericArrayType} is
2633     * assignable to a reference bearing the type modeled by the
2634     * supplied {@code receiverGenericArrayType}, according to the
2635     * assignability rules modeled by this {@link Semantics} instance,
2636     * and if and only if {@code payloadGenericArrayType} models a
2637     * {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType generic array
2638     * type} and not any other type, and if and only if {@code
2639     * receiverGenericArrayType} models a {@linkplain
2640     * java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType generic array type} and not
2641     * any other type.
2642     *
2643     * <p>This method is called by the {@link #assignable(Type, Type)}
2644     * method.</p>
2645     *
2646     * <p>This implementation returns {@code true} if and only if the
2647     * {@linkplain Type#componentType() component type} of the {@code
2648     * receiverGenericArrayType} {@linkplain #assignable(Type, Type)
2649     * is assignable from} the {@linkplain Type#componentType()
2650     * component type} of the {@code payloadGenericArrayType}.</p>
2651     *
2652     * @param <X> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
2653     * receiverGenericArrayType}; often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type
2654     * java.lang.reflect.Type}
2655     *
2656     * @param <Y> the kind of type modeled by the {@code payloadClass};
2657     * often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type java.lang.reflect.Type}
2658     *
2659     * @param receiverGenericArrayType the receiver type as described
2660     * above; must not be {@code null}
2661     *
2662     * @param payloadGenericArrayType the payload type as described
2663     * above; must not be {@code null}
2664     *
2665     * @return {@code true} if and only if the {@linkplain
2666     * Type#componentType() component type} of the {@code
2667     * receiverGenericArrayType} {@linkplain #assignable(Type, Type)
2668     * is assignable from} the {@linkplain Type#componentType()
2669     * component type} of the {@code payloadGenericArrayType}
2670     *
2671     * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
2672     * idempotent and deterministic.
2673     *
2674     * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe
2675     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
2676     *
2677     * @see #assignable(Type, Type)
2678     */
2679    @Override
2680    protected final <X, Y> boolean genericArrayTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverGenericArrayType,
2681                                                                                    final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
2682      return this.assignable(receiverGenericArrayType.componentType(), payloadGenericArrayType.componentType());
2683    }
2684
2685    final <X> List<? extends Type<X>> condense(final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds) {
2686      if (!bounds.isEmpty()) {
2687        final Type<X> firstBound = bounds.get(0);
2688        if (firstBound.named() && firstBound.upperBounded()) {
2689          // it's a type variable
2690          return this.condense(firstBound.upperBounds());
2691        }
2692      }
2693      return bounds;
2694    }
2695
2696  }
2697
2698
2699  /**
2700   * A {@link VariantSemantics} implementation that implements Java
2701   * type assignability semantics, which are covariant.
2702   *
2703   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
2704   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
2705   */
2706  @Experimental
2707  public static class CovariantSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
2708
2709
2710    /*
2711     * Static fields.
2712     */
2713
2714
2715    /**
2716     * A convenient instance of {@link CovariantSemantics}.
2717     *
2718     * @nullability This field is never {@code null}.
2719     */
2720    public static final CovariantSemantics INSTANCE = new CovariantSemantics();
2721
2722
2723    /*
2724     * Constructors.
2725     */
2726
2727
2728    /**
2729     * Creates a new {@link CovariantSemantics}.
2730     */
2731    public CovariantSemantics() {
2732      super();
2733    }
2734
2735
2736    /*
2737     * Instance methods.
2738     */
2739
2740
2741    @Override
2742    protected <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverClass, final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2743      return this.assignable(receiverClass, payloadParameterizedType.type());
2744    }
2745
2746    @Override
2747    protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverClass, final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
2748      final Type<X> receiverComponentType = receiverClass.componentType();
2749      return
2750        this.assignable(receiverComponentType == null ? receiverClass : receiverComponentType,
2751                        payloadGenericArrayType.componentType());
2752    }
2753
2754    @Override
2755    protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverType, final Type<Y> payloadType) {
2756      for (final Type<Y> bound : payloadType.upperBounds()) {
2757        if (this.assignable(receiverType, bound)) {
2758          return true;
2759        }
2760      }
2761      return false;
2762    }
2763
2764    @Override
2765    protected <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType, final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
2766      // Raw types are assignable and either the payload is a generic
2767      // class (and therefore a raw class) or the payload is a class
2768      // whose parameterized supertypes need to be evaluated.
2769      return
2770        this.assignable(receiverParameterizedType.type(), payloadClass) &&
2771        (payloadClass.hasTypeParameters() ||
2772         this.parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromAnyType(receiverParameterizedType, payloadClass.supertypes()));
2773    }
2774
2775    @Override
2776    protected <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2777                                                                                final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2778      return this.parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromAnyType(receiverParameterizedType, payloadParameterizedType.supertypes());
2779    }
2780
2781    private final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromAnyType(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2782                                                                          final Iterable<? extends Type<Y>> payloadTypes) {
2783      for (final Type<Y> payloadType : payloadTypes) {
2784        if (payloadType.hasTypeArguments() &&
2785            this.parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType0(receiverParameterizedType, payloadType)) {
2786          return true;
2787        }
2788      }
2789      return false;
2790    }
2791
2792    private final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType0(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2793                                                                                     final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2794      if (receiverParameterizedType.type().represents(payloadParameterizedType.type())) {
2795        final List<? extends Type<X>> receiverTypeTypeArguments = receiverParameterizedType.typeArguments();
2796        final List<? extends Type<Y>> payloadTypeTypeArguments = payloadParameterizedType.typeArguments();
2797        if (receiverTypeTypeArguments.size() == payloadTypeTypeArguments.size()) {
2798          for (int i = 0; i < receiverTypeTypeArguments.size(); i++) {
2799            final Type<X> receiverTypeTypeArgument = receiverTypeTypeArguments.get(i);
2800            final Type<Y> payloadTypeTypeArgument = payloadTypeTypeArguments.get(i);
2801            if (receiverTypeTypeArgument.wildcard() || payloadTypeTypeArgument.wildcard()) {
2802              if (!this.assignable(receiverTypeTypeArgument, payloadTypeTypeArgument)) {
2803                return false;
2804              }
2805            } else if (!receiverTypeTypeArgument.represents(payloadTypeTypeArgument)) {
2806              return false;
2807            }
2808          }
2809          return true;
2810        }
2811      }
2812      return false;
2813    }
2814
2815    @Override
2816    protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
2817                                                                                 final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2818      for (final Type<Y> bound : payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds()) {
2819        if (this.assignable(receiverParameterizedType, bound)) {
2820          return true;
2821        }
2822      }
2823      return false;
2824    }
2825
2826    @Override
2827    protected final <X, Y> boolean genericArrayTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverGenericArrayType,
2828                                                                         final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
2829      return this.assignable(receiverGenericArrayType.componentType(), payloadClass.componentType());
2830    }
2831
2832
2833    @Override
2834    protected final <X, Y> boolean typeVariableIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverTypeVariable,
2835                                                                            final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2836      return receiverTypeVariable.supertypeOf(payloadTypeVariable);
2837    }
2838
2839    @Override
2840    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2841                                                                     final boolean lowerBounded,
2842                                                                     final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
2843      return
2844        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadClass) &&
2845        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadClass, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
2846    }
2847
2848    @Override
2849    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2850                                                                                 final boolean lowerBounded,
2851                                                                                 final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
2852      return
2853        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadParameterizedType) &&
2854        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadParameterizedType, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
2855    }
2856
2857    @Override
2858    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2859                                                                                final boolean lowerBounded,
2860                                                                                final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
2861      return
2862        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadGenericArrayType) &&
2863        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadGenericArrayType, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
2864    }
2865
2866    @Override
2867    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2868                                                                            final boolean lowerBounded,
2869                                                                            final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
2870      return
2871        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadTypeVariable) &&
2872        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadTypeVariable, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
2873    }
2874
2875    @Override
2876    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromWildcardType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2877                                                                            final boolean receiverWildcardTypeLowerBounded,
2878                                                                            final Type<Y> payloadWildcardType,
2879                                                                            final boolean payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded) {
2880      final Type<X> receiverWildcardTypeUpperBound = receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0);
2881      if (this.assignable(receiverWildcardTypeUpperBound, payloadWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0))) {
2882        if (receiverWildcardTypeLowerBounded) {
2883          return
2884            payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded &&
2885            this.assignable(payloadWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0), receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0));
2886        }
2887        return
2888          !payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded ||
2889          this.assignable(receiverWildcardTypeUpperBound, payloadWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0));
2890      }
2891      return false;
2892    }
2893
2894
2895  }
2896
2897  /**
2898   * A {@link VariantSemantics} implementation that does not permit
2899   * subtyping, but that compares wildcard types covariantly.
2900   *
2901   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
2902   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
2903   */
2904  @Experimental
2905  public static class InvariantSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
2906
2907
2908    /*
2909     * Static fields.
2910     */
2911
2912
2913    /**
2914     * An instance of {@link InvariantSemantics}.
2915     *
2916     * @nullability This field is never {@code null}.
2917     */
2918    public static final InvariantSemantics INSTANCE = new InvariantSemantics();
2919
2920
2921    /*
2922     * Constructors.
2923     */
2924
2925
2926    /**
2927     * Creates a new {@link InvariantSemantics}.
2928     */
2929    public InvariantSemantics() {
2930      super();
2931    }
2932
2933
2934    /*
2935     * Instance methods.
2936     */
2937
2938
2939    @Override // VariantSemantics
2940    public <X, Y> boolean assignable(final Type<X> receiverType, final Type<Y> payloadType) {
2941      if (receiverType.wildcard() || payloadType.wildcard()) {
2942        return CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(receiverType, payloadType);
2943      }
2944      return receiverType.represents(payloadType);
2945    }
2946
2947  }
2948
2949  /**
2950   * A {@link VariantSemantics} implementation that implements the
2951   * rules of <a
2952   * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#typesafe_resolution"
2953   * target="_parent"><em>typesafe resolution</em></a>.
2954   *
2955   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
2956   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
2957   */
2958  @Experimental
2959  public static class CdiSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
2960
2961
2962    /*
2963     * Static fields.
2964     */
2965
2966
2967    /**
2968     * An instance of {@link CdiSemantics}.
2969     *
2970     * @nullability This field is never {@code null}.
2971     */
2972    public static final CdiSemantics INSTANCE = new CdiSemantics();
2973
2974
2975    /*
2976     * Constructors.
2977     */
2978
2979
2980    /**
2981     * Creates a new {@link CdiSemantics}.
2982     */
2983    public CdiSemantics() {
2984      super();
2985    }
2986
2987
2988    /*
2989     * Instance methods.
2990     */
2991
2992
2993    /**
2994     * Returns {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link Type}
2995     * represents an <em>actual type</em>, which the <a
2996     * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#assignable_parameters"
2997     * target="_parent">CDI specification</a> implies, but does not
2998     * explicitly state, is either a class, a parameterized type or a
2999     * generic array type.
3000     *
3001     * <p>Actual types, though not defined, are <a
3002     * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#typesafe_resolution"
3003     * target="_parent">critically important to CDI's concept of
3004     * <em>typesafe resolution</em></a>.</p>
3005     *
3006     * <p>The concept of an actual type is not mentioned in the <a
3007     * href="https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se17/html/jls-4.html#jls-4.1"
3008     * target="_parent">Java Language Specification</a>.
3009     *
3010     * @param type the {@link Type} in question; must not be {@code
3011     * null}
3012     *
3013     * @return {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link Type}
3014     * returns {@code false} from invocations of both its {@link
3015     * #upperBounded()} and {@link #lowerBounded()} methods; {@code
3016     * false} otherwise
3017     *
3018     * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}
3019     *
3020     * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
3021     *
3022     * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by
3023     * multiple threads.
3024     */
3025    public final boolean actualType(final Type<?> type) {
3026      return !type.upperBounded() && !type.lowerBounded();
3027    }
3028
3029    @Convenience
3030    @Override
3031    public final boolean assignable(final java.lang.reflect.Type receiverType,
3032                                    final java.lang.reflect.Type payloadType,
3033                                    final boolean ignoredBox) {
3034      // Boxing is always required in CDI.
3035      return this.assignable(CdiType.of(receiverType), CdiType.of(payloadType));
3036    }
3037
3038    @Override
3039    protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverClass,
3040                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3041      if (receiverClass.represents(payloadParameterizedType.type())) {
3042        for (final Type<Y> payloadTypeTypeArgument : payloadParameterizedType.typeArguments()) {
3043          if (payloadTypeTypeArgument.top()) {
3044            // OK
3045          } else if (payloadTypeTypeArgument.typeVariable()) {
3046            final List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds = payloadTypeTypeArgument.upperBounds();
3047            switch (bounds.size()) {
3048            case 0:
3049              // OK
3050              break;
3051            case 1:
3052              if (!bounds.get(0).top()) {
3053                return false;
3054              }
3055              break;
3056            default:
3057              return false;
3058            }
3059          } else {
3060            return false;
3061          }
3062        }
3063        return true;
3064      }
3065      return false;
3066    }
3067
3068    @Override
3069    protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
3070                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
3071      if (receiverParameterizedType.type().represents(payloadClass)) {
3072        for (final Type<X> receiverTypeTypeArgument : receiverParameterizedType.typeArguments()) {
3073          if (receiverTypeTypeArgument.top()) {
3074            // OK
3075          } else if (receiverTypeTypeArgument.typeVariable()) {
3076            final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds = receiverTypeTypeArgument.upperBounds();
3077            switch (bounds.size()) {
3078            case 0:
3079              // OK
3080              break;
3081            case 1:
3082              if (!bounds.get(0).top()) {
3083                return false;
3084              }
3085              break;
3086            default:
3087              return false;
3088            }
3089          } else {
3090            return false;
3091          }
3092        }
3093        return true;
3094      }
3095      return false;
3096    }
3097
3098    @Override
3099    protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
3100                                                                                      final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3101      if (receiverParameterizedType.type().represents(payloadParameterizedType.type())) {
3102        final List<? extends Type<X>> receiverTypeTypeArguments = receiverParameterizedType.typeArguments();
3103        final List<? extends Type<Y>> payloadTypeTypeArguments = payloadParameterizedType.typeArguments();
3104        if (receiverTypeTypeArguments.size() == payloadTypeTypeArguments.size()) {
3105          for (int i = 0; i < receiverTypeTypeArguments.size(); i++) {
3106            if (!CdiTypeArgumentSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(receiverTypeTypeArguments.get(i), payloadTypeTypeArguments.get(i))) {
3107              return false;
3108            }
3109          }
3110          return true;
3111        }
3112      }
3113      return false;
3114    }
3115
3116
3117    /*
3118     * Inner and nested classes.
3119     */
3120
3121
3122    @Experimental
3123    private static class CdiTypeArgumentSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
3124
3125      private static final CdiTypeArgumentSemantics INSTANCE = new CdiTypeArgumentSemantics();
3126
3127      private CdiTypeArgumentSemantics() {
3128        super();
3129      }
3130
3131      @Override
3132      protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverClass,
3133                                                                       final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3134        return this.actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverClass, payloadTypeVariable);
3135      }
3136
3137      @Override
3138      protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
3139                                                                                   final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3140        return this.actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverParameterizedType, payloadTypeVariable);
3141      }
3142
3143      @Override
3144      protected final <X, Y> boolean genericArrayTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverGenericArrayType,
3145                                                                                  final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3146        return this.actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverGenericArrayType, payloadTypeVariable);
3147      }
3148
3149      private final <X, Y> boolean actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverActualType,
3150                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3151        // Section 5.2.4 of the CDI specification is mealy-mouthed but
3152        // interpretable:
3153        //
3154        // "…the required type parameter [receiverActualType] is an
3155        // actual type [never defined, but implied by other sentences
3156        // scattered throughout the specification to be either a
3157        // class, parameterized type or generic array type], the bean
3158        // type parameter is a type variable [payloadTypeVariable] and
3159        // the actual type [receiverActualType] is assignable to the
3160        // upper bound[s], if any [there will always be one], of the
3161        // type variable [payloadTypeVariable], or…"
3162        //
3163        // So perhaps somewhat counterintuitively check all the bounds
3164        // of the *payload* and see if the *receiver* is assignable to
3165        // all of them.
3166        for (final Type<Y> bound : this.condense(payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds())) {
3167          // Note that this is somewhat backwards to what you may expect.
3168          if (!CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(bound, receiverActualType)) {
3169            return false;
3170          }
3171        }
3172        return true;
3173      }
3174
3175      @Override
3176      protected final <X, Y> boolean typeVariableIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverTypeVariable,
3177                                                                              final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3178        // Section 5.2.4 again:
3179        //
3180        // "…the required type parameter and the bean type parameter are
3181        // both type variables and the upper bound of the required [receiver]
3182        // type parameter is assignable to the upper bound, if any, of
3183        // the bean [payload] type parameter."
3184        //
3185        // The first of many problems with this:
3186        //
3187        // This is of course ambiguous.  See
3188        // https://issues.redhat.com/browse/CDI-440 which was
3189        // unceremoniously closed for no good reason.
3190        //
3191        // "For example, the bullet
3192        //
3193        // * the required type parameter and the bean type parameter
3194        //   are both type variables and the upper bound of the
3195        //   required type parameter is assignable to the upper bound,
3196        //   if any, of the bean type parameter.
3197        //
3198        // should have meaning similar to:
3199        //
3200        // for each upper bound T of the bean type parameter, there is
3201        // an (at least one) upper bound of the required type which is
3202        // assignable to T."
3203        //
3204        // This is not normal Java/covariant semantics.  In Java, if
3205        // you have two type variables, A extends Object and B extends
3206        // Object, you cannot assign B to A or vice versa.  Here, the
3207        // CDI specification is essentially performing a kind of type
3208        // erasure in this one case.
3209        //
3210        // In CDI, when a type variable is a type argument (by
3211        // definition of a parameterized type), the platform basically
3212        // erases it.  In CDI you cannot have a type-variable-typed
3213        // injection point, because of course you can't predict what
3214        // "value" that injection point's type will have at
3215        // application analysis time.  So it stands to reason that if
3216        // there is a type variable "anywhere in" the injection point
3217        // (as a type argument, say) it will effectively be erased to
3218        // its bounds.
3219        return this.match(payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds(), receiverTypeVariable.upperBounds());
3220      }
3221
3222      @Override
3223      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3224                                                                       final boolean lowerBounded,
3225                                                                       final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
3226        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadClass);
3227      }
3228
3229      @Override
3230      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3231                                                                                   final boolean lowerBounded,
3232                                                                                   final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3233        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadParameterizedType);
3234      }
3235
3236      @Override
3237      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3238                                                                                  final boolean lowerBounded,
3239                                                                                  final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
3240        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadGenericArrayType);
3241      }
3242
3243      private final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3244                                                                          final boolean lowerBounded,
3245                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadActualType) {
3246        return
3247          (!lowerBounded || this.match(payloadActualType, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds())) &&
3248          this.match(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds(), payloadActualType);
3249      }
3250
3251      @Override
3252      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3253                                                                              final boolean lowerBounded,
3254                                                                              final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3255        final List<? extends Type<Y>> condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds = this.condense(payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds());
3256        if (!lowerBounded || this.match(condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds, false, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds(), true)) {
3257          final List<? extends Type<X>> condensedReceiverWildcardUpperBounds = this.condense(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds());
3258          return
3259            this.match(condensedReceiverWildcardUpperBounds, false, condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds, false) ||
3260            this.match(condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds, false, condensedReceiverWildcardUpperBounds, false);
3261        }
3262        return false;
3263      }
3264
3265      private final <Y> boolean match(final Type<?> bound0, final List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1) {
3266        return this.match(bound0, bounds1, true);
3267      }
3268
3269      private final <Y> boolean match(final Type<?> bound0, List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1, final boolean condense1) {
3270        if (!bounds1.isEmpty()) {
3271          if (condense1) {
3272            bounds1 = this.condense(bounds1);
3273          }
3274          boolean match = false;
3275          for (final Type<?> bound1 : bounds1) {
3276            if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(bound0, bound1)) {
3277              match = true;
3278              break;
3279            }
3280          }
3281          if (!match) {
3282            return false;
3283          }
3284        }
3285        return true;
3286      }
3287
3288      private final <X> boolean match(final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0, final Type<?> bound1) {
3289        return this.match(bounds0, true, bound1);
3290      }
3291
3292      private final <X> boolean match(List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0, final boolean condense0, final Type<?> bound1) {
3293        if (!bounds0.isEmpty()) {
3294          if (condense0) {
3295            bounds0 = this.condense(bounds0);
3296          }
3297          boolean match = false;
3298          for (final Type<X> bound0 : bounds0) {
3299            if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(bound0, bound1)) {
3300              match = true;
3301              break;
3302            }
3303          }
3304          if (!match) {
3305            return false;
3306          }
3307        }
3308        return true;
3309      }
3310
3311      private final <X, Y> boolean match(final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0, final List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1) {
3312        return this.match(bounds0, true, bounds1, true);
3313      }
3314
3315      private final <X, Y> boolean match(List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0,
3316                                         final boolean condense0,
3317                                         List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1,
3318                                         final boolean condense1) {
3319        if (!bounds0.isEmpty() && !bounds1.isEmpty()) {
3320          for (final Type<X> bound0 : condense0 ? this.condense(bounds0) : bounds0) {
3321            boolean match = false;
3322            for (final Type<Y> bound1 : condense1 ? this.condense(bounds1) : bounds1) {
3323              if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(bound0, bound1)) {
3324                match = true;
3325                break;
3326              }
3327            }
3328            if (!match) {
3329              return false;
3330            }
3331          }
3332        }
3333        return true;
3334      }
3335
3336    }
3337  }
3338}
